page.title: 07LOCHGOILHEAD-LAW & ORDER(2)
page.content: In 1984 there was a total of 84 crimes and offences,a drop of 8% on the previous year.Of these 31 were thefts, the most common crime in the area. Fortunately most crimes are solved and the detection rate is 65%. Lochgoilhead Police Station has a cell but it is not{legalised,}it can be used for detention only.If a prisoner is to be held over-night he/she is taken to Dunoon. Many of the offenders are sent for trial to{Dunoon District Court}but for minor offences they are sent to{ {Inveraray District Court.}For crimes of a serious nature the offenders are sent for trial to the{High Courts}in {Glasgow and Edinburgh.}Fortunately this is a rare occurence.
